title: A modest enquiry into the mystery of iniquity by H. More.
author: More, Henry, 1614-1687.
publisher: Printed by J. Flesher for W. Morden,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

Part 1. Containing a careful and impartial delineation of the true idea of antichristianism in the real and genuine members thereof ... --Part 2. Synopsis prophetica ... containing a compendious prospect into those prophecies of the Holy Scripture wherein the reign of Antichrist ... is prefigured or foretold.
